### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15573](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15573.html) (dead code: Remove dead option in HexStr con
`static const` vs `constexpr` vs `static constexpr` for POD is a stylistic difference without any effect on the compiled binary.\n\nStylistic changes without rationale are generally not accepted.
No activity for more than a month. Closing for now. Let me know if you want me to reopen this
IMO there is no gain using `std::array` in these cases.

FWIW, this is what the C++ Core Guidelines say about the gains of using `std::array`:s instead of C arrays in the general case:\n* [`ES.27: Use std::array or stack_array for arrays on the stack`](https://isocpp.github.io/CppCoreGuidelines/CppCoreGuidelines#es27-use-stdarray-or-stack_array-for-arrays-on-the-stack)\n* [`SL.con.1: Prefer using STL array or vector instead of a C array`](https://isoc
